description: This file demonstrates how to use the tool call limit feature in an agent to restrict the number of tool calls an agent can make, specifically using the agno framework with Claude model and YFinanceTools.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that can perform tasks using specified models and tools, with support for call limits.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: A model class representing the Claude language model from Anthropic.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: A tool class for fetching financial data from Yahoo Finance.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to print the agent's response to a given prompt, with optional streaming.
